definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

pinyin: zhong3 zu2 zhong1 xin1 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: They've launched a campaign of genocide against the immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 他們對移民進行了種族滅盡。

sentences.english: The white racists tried to keep down the Indians by force.
sentences.chinese: 白人種族主義者企圖用武力壓服印第安人。

sentences.english: Knell beetles have also been known to be used as mounts by Underdark races.
sentences.chinese: 已經知道喪鐘甲蟲會被幽暗地域的種族用作坐騎。

sentences.english: About gender and race differences in self-concept.
sentences.chinese: 自我概念上的性別差異和種族差異。

sentences.english: It's ethnocentrism that leads to failure in international business.
sentences.chinese: 它的種族優越感從而導致其在國際貿易的失敗。

sentences.english: All races have their pluses and their minuses and asian people are just the same.
sentences.chinese: 所有種族都有自己的缺點和優點，亞洲人也是如此。

sentences.english: S-IV-37: How is the treatment situation for foreign ethnic groups in Germany?
sentences.chinese: 德國對外來種族羣體的治療狀況如何？

sentences.english: Racial feats are available only to characters of a specific race.
sentences.chinese: 種族專長僅適用於人物的特定種族。

sentences.english: Racial feats are available only to characters of a specific race.
sentences.chinese: 種族專長僅適用於人物的特定種族。

sentences.english: Under these conditions, ethnic family patterns were slowly broken down by an increasingly urbanized, industrialized environment.
sentences.chinese: 工業化的日益發展，種族家庭的模式緩慢地解體。

sentences.english: Rwanda was in the throes of genocide.
sentences.chinese: 盧旺達陷於種族滅絕的陣痛。

sentences.english: She faces charges of inciting racial hatred by distributing anti-semitic leaflets.
sentences.chinese: 她因散發反猶傳單而面臨着煽動種族仇恨的指控。

sentences.english: The cuisine of Singapore can indicate the ethnic diversity of the culture of Singa­pore.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡的美食展現了新加坡文化中的種族多樣性。

sentences.english: It was only in 1967 that the United States finally struck down its anti miscegenation laws.
sentences.chinese: 直到1967年，美國才廢除了反種族通婚的法律。

sentences.english: Needless to say, the British made no attempt to introduce anti-racist legislation.
sentences.chinese: 不用說，英國人是懶得在香港對反種族主義立法的。

definition: to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
